rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Sorry, no real body just yet—they saved your mim before
it shut down. Too bad, eh? Better luck next time you die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0013
rows.name: He'll be up and around in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0014
rows.name: Why don't you go take a look for yourself, say hi?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0016
rows.name: Doug...we need to talk. Can you spare a minute?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0019
rows.name: I have a suspicion...well, it's more than a suspicion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0021
rows.name:
The Ganglion were struggling to retrieve
that alien mech—the Vita.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0022
rows.name: Lao suggested we go after it. He even planned the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0024
rows.name:
and the Ganglion know exactly where it is when they
come for it, with Lao's team away from guard duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0026
rows.name:
And this last mission—he gave us coordinates
for a Lifehold unit he found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0027
rows.name: Turned out to be a Ganglion ambush.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0028
rows.name: It's too much to be a coincidence, Doug.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well...what do you think, Rook?
You think he's a spy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0030
rows.name: Even if you're right, he saved our bacon plenty of times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0031
rows.name: We should at least give him a chance to explain himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0034
rows.name: Agreed—there must be some other explanation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0036
rows.name: He wouldn't sell us out—no way, no how.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0037
rows.name: All right, Doug. I hear you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0038
rows.name: If you still trust him, then so will I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09110100_MSG0039
rows.name: You're doing the right thing, Elma.[ST:wait ]
